room_title: Escape room "The School of Hard Locks" by Mainely Escapes in Waterville
review: Had a blast doing the School of Hard Locks. Can't wait to go back again and try out their other rooms! Highly recommended for a fun night out with family or friends.

room_title: Escape room "The School of Hard Locks" by Mainely Escapes in Waterville
review: Took a pack (5) of 13-year-old boys in for the School of Hard Locks. The guy running it was super nice. The boys had a blast and I was even able to go shop around for a few.

room_title: Escape room "The School of Hard Locks" by Mainely Escapes in Waterville
review: We had a blast at the School of Hard Locks! The gentleman running it was awesome to deal with! Definitely recommend this place! Great thing to do, especially on a rainy afternoon. Can't wait to go back and try the other rooms.
